Title: The Gift of Relaxation
Description:
Self-love can take many different forms. And on occasion it can take the form of relaxing. 

The night elf by the fireworks seems particularly relaxed. 

Perhaps you could ask him for his insights on relaxation.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Bordol Dewgarden about relaxation, then relax by Olivia's Pond in Stormwind.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Bordol Dewgarden at the Gala of Gifts.
